item.Q:
Write the character:
appear; present; now; existing; current
item.A:
traditional: 現
xiàn
现在 (現在) xiànzài now; at present; modern; current; nowadays

item.Q:
Write the character:
before; in front; ago; former; previous; earlier; front
item.A:
qián
目前 mùqián at the present time; currently

zuì
最后 (最後) zuìhòu final; last; finally; ultimate

zhēn
真正 zhēnzhèng real; true; genuine

item.Q:
Write the character:
new; newly; abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆; meso- (chem.)
item.A:
xīn
重新 chóngxīn again; once more; re-

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: and; together with; with; sum; union; peace; harmony; surname
2: soft; warm
3: cap (a poem); respond in singing
item.A:
1: hé 2: huó 3: hè
和平 hépíng peace 暖和 nuǎnhuó warm; nice and warm 附和 fùhè (v) repeat in agreement (actions; words)

yīn
因此 yīncǐ that is why; for that reason; therefore; for this reason

guǒ
如果 rúguǒ if; in case; in the event that

item.Q:
Write the character:
idea; meaning; wish; desire; intention; (abbr.) Italy
item.A:
yì
注意 zhùyì take note of; (pay) attention (to)

xiàn

xiàn
appear; present; now; existing; current

item.Q:
Write the character: xiàn
(xiànzài de xiàn)
item.A:
traditional: 現
appear; present; now; existing; current
现在 (現在) xiànzài now; at present; modern; current; nowadays

item.Q:
Write the character: qián
(mùqián de qián)
item.A:
before; in front; ago; former; previous; earlier; front
目前 mùqián at the present time; currently

item.Q:
Write the character: zuì
(zuìhòu de zuì)
item.A:
(the) most; -est
最后 (最後) zuìhòu final; last; finally; ultimate

item.Q:
Write the character: zhēn
(zhēnzhèng de zhēn)
item.A:
real; true; genuine
真正 zhēnzhèng real; true; genuine

item.Q:
Write the character: xīn
(chóngxīn de xīn)
item.A:
new; newly; abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆; meso- (chem.)
重新 chóngxīn again; once more; re-

item.Q:
Write the character: hé
(hépíng de hé)
item.A:
and; together with; with; sum; union; peace; harmony; surname He
和平 hépíng peace

item.Q:
Write the character: huó
(nuǎnhuó de huó)
item.A:
soft; warm
暖和 nuǎnhuó warm; nice and warm

item.Q:
Write the character: hè
(fùhè de hè)
item.A:
cap (a poem); respond in singing
附和 fùhè (v) repeat in agreement (actions; words)

item.Q:
Write the character: yīn
(yīncǐ de yīn)
item.A:
cause; reason; because
因此 yīncǐ that is why; for that reason; therefore; for this reason

item.Q:
Write the character: guǒ
(rúguǒ de guǒ)
item.A:
fruit; result
如果 rúguǒ if; in case; in the event that

item.Q:
Write the character: yì
(zhùyì de yì)
item.A:
idea; meaning; wish; desire; intention; (abbr.) Italy
注意 zhùyì take note of; (pay) attention (to)

traditional: 出現
chūxiàn to appear; to arise; to emerge

traditional: 現在
xiànzài now; at present; modern; current; nowadays

traditional: 現成
xiànchéng ready made

traditional: 現時
xiànshí current

traditional: 現有
xiànyǒu currently existing; currently available

traditional: 發現
fāxiàn to find; to discover
shàngqián (v) go forward
zhīqián before; prior to; ago
yǐqián before; formerly; previous
qiánrén predecessor; forebears; the person facing you

traditional: 前前後後
qiánqiánhòuhòu before and after
qiántái forestage
qiántiān the day before yesterday
qiánnián the year before last

traditional: 前後
qiánhòu around; from beginning to end; all around
qiántí premise; precondition; prerequisite

Táiqián (N) Taiqian (place in Henan); the front of the stage
táiqián Taiqian
dàqiántí sumption
tíqián to shift to an earlier date; to bring forward; to advance
shēngqián during one's life; while living; one's lifetime

traditional: 當前
dāngqián current; today's; modern; present; to be facing (us)
zuìdà biggest; largest; maximum
zuìhǎo best; (you) had better (do what we suggest)

traditional: 最後
zuìhòu final; last; finally; ultimate

traditional: 最為
zuìwéi the most
tiānzhēn naive; innocent; artless
zhēnxīn sincere; heartfelt
zhēnshì (idiom) "it is truly..."
zhēnde really
zhēnzhēn precisely
zhēnzhī real knowledge

Dàxīn (N) Daxin (place in Guangxi)
dàxīn Daxin

traditional: 新中國
xīnzhōngguó new China
xīnrén (n) new-age person; new type of person; (n) newlywed, in particular a new bride
xīnnián New Year

traditional: 新會
Xīnhuì Xinhui city and county in Guangdong
xīnhuì Xinhui
xīnshēng newborn; new student

Xīndū (N) Xindu (place in Sichuan)
xīndōu Xindu
bùhé not get along well; be on bad terms; be at odds; discord

Zhōnghé Chungho (city in Taiwan)
zhōnghé to neutralize
héhǎo to become reconciled
Dàhé Yamato (possibly 3rd century AD), Japanese state before written records began in 7th century AD, its real dating is controversial
yīnzǐ factor

traditional: 因為
yīnwèi because; owing to; on account of
yīnér therefore; as a result; thus; and as a result, ...
chéngyīn cause; factor
yīnguǒ karma; cause and effect
rúguǒ if; in case; in the event that

traditional: 後果
hòuguǒ consequences; aftermath
chéngguǒ result; achievement; gain; profit
guǒzi fruit
guǒrán really; sure enough; as expected
guǒzhēn really; indeed
yīxīnyīyì intently
bùzàiyì pay no attention to; take no notice of; not mind; negligent; careless
bùyì unexpectedly; unawareness; unpreparedness

ZhōngYì Sino-Italian
zhòngyì to take sb's fancy; to win approval
tóngyì to agree; to consent; to approve
zàiyì (v) care about; mind
dàyì general idea; main idea; careless
tiānyì providence; the Will of Heaven
hǎoyì (n) good intention; kindness
rúyì as one wants; according to one's wishes
déyì proud of oneself; pleased with oneself; complacent
xīnyì regard; kindly feelings; intention

traditional: 會意
huìyì combined ideogram (one of the Six Methods 六書|六书 of forming Chinese characters); Chinese character that combines the meanings of existing elements; also known as joint ideogram or associative compounds
yǒuyì intend; intentionally; be interested (in)
běnyì original idea; real intention; etymon

traditional: 無意
wúyì inadvertent; accidental
shēngyi business
yòngyì intention; purpose
